channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Gate leading from KGV playing fields not working properly, 14th July
item.description:
The gate leading from the KGV playing fields by the play park to the alleyway is sticking badly and someone has wrapped tape around the upright post. It is causing a problem for wheelchair users
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Simmonds Road, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Foul language graffiti on young children’s play equipment, 14th July
item.description:
The play area on ermin street. Bright blue graffiti all over a child’s park. Foul language

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 53, Ermin Street, Brockworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Blocked drain on Tennyson Road on the corner, 14th July
item.description:
Drain is blocked by soil (?) and ends up not being able to drain when it rains.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 92, Tennyson Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
